title: unbearable ping spikes (up to 600+) (rito help pls)
body: Lately I have been getting ping spikes up to 600 and i know it has something to do with the servers because i checked my internet connection and it is perfectly fine, my pc has had no problems in the past with running the game, i am able to play other games like overwatch & rocket league with no problems, etc. I am desperate need of a fix because at this point the game is unplayable. If i get a rioters help with this that would be gr8

replies.body: It's not completely uncommon to be able to reach some servers alright and not be able to reach others sometimes. Your network might just be having some difficulty getting a good signal from our servers if you're able to play other games fine and still have that crazy ping. Check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly, as sometimes you need to update a few things after patches.

so i checked it all out and since i assume my problem is packet loss i went to take a Netalyzr test and the errors i got were..


â€¢Your DNS resolver returns IP addresses for names that do not exist 

Your ISP's DNS server returns IP addresses even for domain names which should not resolve. Instead of an error, the DNS server returns an address of (ip adress), which does not resolve. You can inspect the resulting HTML content here. 

There are several possible explanations for this behavior. The most likely cause is that the ISP is attempting to profit from customer's typos by presenting advertisements in response to bad requests, but it could also be due to an error or misconfiguration in the DNS server.
